hero.description: With Secret Friend, encourage acts of kindness among your employees

bottomLead.description: Available online or in your favorite store

step1.title: Benefits for Protégés
step1.description:
Sharing their state of mind with concerned and listening people
Feeling a protective presence
Feeling gratitude and encouragement
Experiencing moments of surprise and joy

step2.title: Benefits for Guardian Angels
step2.description:
Discovering your protégé through the application
Taking on Kindness Challenges
Taking initiative
Earning points and rewards

step3.title: Benefits for the managers
step3.description:
Determining the relational intelligence of their employees
Identifying hidden skills
Spreading small daily practices and attention among teams
Breaking down the barriers between departments
Reinforcing employees involvement in the company
Getting an alert tool for tough situations of suffering

concept.title: 3 minutes a day change your way of seeing the world
concept.desc1: With our concept, let your employees shine and share their kindness
concept.desc2: Secret Friend breaks down the barriers through benevolence and fun and dynamic Kindness Challenges
concept.protege:
Each participant is pampered
 by a Guardian Angel
concept.angel:
Each participant is at the same time
the Guardian Angel of someone else
